body.p: Some Standards developed before the 2018 Conceptual Framework use the term ‘constructive obligation’ to refer to some circumstances that give rise to an obligation or the term ‘economic compulsion’ to refer to some circumstances that give rise to no obligation. The 2018 Conceptual Framework does not use those terms to distinguish circumstances when an obligation exists from circumstances when an obligation does not exist because the Board concluded that those terms have not proved helpful for that purpose and are not necessary.
